actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Buildings Act of 1959 relating to leased space.

summary.text: Amends the Public Buildings Act of 1959 to require approval by the Senate Committee on the Environment and Public Works and the House Committee on Public Works and Transportation before: (1) leasing space in a building at a rate in excess of $500,000; or (2) altering leased premises which involves more than $250,000 worth of alterations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Buildings Act of 1959 relating to leased space.
